title:
The Duck Is Back In Osaka

attachments.displayName:
The Duck Is Back In Osaka

For one week only (until Friday, October 18th), Florentijn Hofman's Rubber Duck will be floating serenely at Osaka's Nakanoshima. The Rubber Duck knows no frontiers, it doesn't discriminate people and doesn't have a political connotation. The friendly, floating Rubber Duck has healing properties: it can relieve mondial tensions as well as define them. If you happen to be around Osaka this week, you'll be able to view the Duck as well as enjoy a bonus Rubber Duck-themed food plate at nearby Rihga Royal Hotel

object.content:
The Duck Is Back In Osaka

For one week only (until Friday, October 18th), Florentijn Hofman's Rubber Duck will be floating serenely at Osaka's Nakanoshima. The Rubber Duck knows no frontiers, it doesn't discriminate people and doesn't have a political connotation. The friendly, floating Rubber Duck has healing properties: it can relieve mondial tensions as well as define them. If you happen to be around Osaka this week, you'll be able to view the Duck as well as enjoy a bonus Rubber Duck-themed food plate at nearby Rihga Royal Hotel
